$checkbox:
<$checkbox
 tiddler =""
 tag="<tiddlerTagName>"

 default ="<fieldValIsUndefined>"
 class ="<cssClassname>"
>
<!--labelHere-->
</$checkbox>
<<apidoc CheckboxWidget>>
